radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Radiography of the skull and chest
CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Small lymph nodes, 7 mm or less in diameter, in the mediastinum and hilar regions did not change on repeated studies 3, 6, and 10 months later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No intracranial abnormalities; a small soft-tissue mass was noted in the left sub-occipital scalp.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest and abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: Small lymph nodes in the mediastinum and hilar regions, which did not change on repeated studies.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Did not change on repeated studies 3, 6, and 10 months later.
